page.title: 01PRESTON CAPES
page.content:
PRESTON CAPES is a village situated on a hill 594 feet above sea level. It is in a conservation area where the farming is mainly arable. Wildlife is abundant. The nearest town is Daventry.
Conservation and wildlife - ECOLOGY- SITUATED ON A HILL - LANDSCAPE - mainly arable area - FARMING - affairs managed by Parish Council - GOVERNMENT- much sought after area - HOUSING- facilities - ECONOMICS, TRANSPORT, TRADESMEN, ENERGY, HEALTH - village life and leisure - CLUBS, RELIGION, CUSTOMS, RECREATION, ENTERTAINMENT, EVENTS -origins and history - LOCAL HISTORY, BUILDINGS - public figures - BIOGRAPHY - inhabitants - POPULATION, EMPLOYMENT, educational trusts, Adult Education - EDUCATION.
